lead_paragraph: BRADEMAS--John. The Board of Trustees of Anatolia College, Thessaloniki, Greece mourn the passing of its lifetime Board Member, Dr. John Brademas, distinguished former member of Congress and President of New York University. We acknowledge his impact on education and Hellenism. His wise counsel will be missed. Albert Elfner, Chair, Anatolia College Board of Trustees 1/3
